entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4 except minus 5 over eastern sections. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4 except minus 5 over eastern sections. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
